NAME: Narakesari Sethuram
ABOUT:
Have had the distinction of shipping more than 9 branded Microsoft products/services, spanning  a career of  13 years in Microsoft.Started on an individual contributor role in development, and then took over an engineering team of nearly 20 engineers, constituting a mix of full-time and vendor pool, I have had a chance to sharpen my acumen on delivering great software, building high performing teams and delivering to strategy to various product portfolio. Working on distributed development centers across time zones, successfully internalized the model to effectively collaborate and succeed across geo boundaries.


Played pivotal role in hiring, developing and consolidating extremely competent engineering teams of varying sizes from five to thirty, and then moved on early 2014 to explore deeper aspects of business design, team development and strategy through a formal MBA program.
	
Having gained extensive, hands-on experience, with deep insight of successful business practices, technical leadership, and team building with a global software giant, complemented by an ongoing classroom MBA program, now looking to dwell into the next wave of exciting challenges in the computing world of mobility, services and analytics.

Strengths:

Software product Development
Team  development 
Team management
Project Management
Product Development
Full Lifecycle Management
Business Strategy
Strategic Planning / Analysis

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Technology evangelism, adoption and student training
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Executed on a long cherished ambition of volunteering for a NGO (Isha Foundation)  in training competent senior secondary students towards diverse software skills. Closely worked with one batch of graduating students over a year to instill a strong fervor of software academic pursuit. In parallel, reviewed the technology stack for student-360 tool, revamped portal design to consolidate richer student data acquisition and a customized reporting system. Bootstrapped vendor relation to revamp the portal. The pupil-pod system, with integrated analytics, ability to record unstructured data sourced via diverse student electives, has been envisioned to evolve into a “CRM-lite” solution

HONOR & AWARD.Title: Best people Manager for high Workgroup Health index score in 2009
